metadata.author: Xiao-Fei Qiu, Tuo Jiang, Shan-Song Lu, Nimat Ullah Khattak
metadata.title: Late Neoproterozoic mafic sills in the Suizhou area of the South Qinling block: constraints for the tectonic evolution of the northern margin of the Yangtze craton

metadata.abstract: This work was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China [41303026,41902232].

funding: This work was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China [41303026,41902232].
acknowledgments: This study was supported by National Science Foundation of China (Grants 41303026, 41902232). The authors are grateful to Long Zhao and Pei-Jun Lin for their considerable help during the LA-ICP-MS analyses. Discussion with Profs. Xian-Hua Li and Yuan-Bao Wu significantly improved an earlier version of this manuscript. Editor Robert Stern and three anonymous reviewers are kindly thanked for their thorough reviews and constructive criticisms. Special thanks to those medical staff who are fighting against the Novel coronavirus-2019 in Wuhan, China.
